INTRODUCTION.INTRO_PARAGRAPH: I am a self-taught Vancouver based full-stack developer with fluency in multiple front-end and back-end technologies. Currently I am working as a Software Developer Intern at Geotab Inc., where my team and I help transportation planners uncover previously hidden contextualized vehicle insights in an easy-to-use, easy-to-integrate platform.

ABOUT_ME.PARAGRAPH_1: Hello, I'm Sanyam Gupta, a final-year Management Information Systems student at Simon Fraser University. If I had to capture myself in a word, it would be "autodidact." From a young age, my curiosity has driven me to independently explore new territories, whether it's delving into coding or immersing myself in various subjects.
ABOUT_ME.PARAGRAPH_2: Entering university with no prior programming knowledge, I embraced self-learning through platforms like YouTube and Udemy, transforming into a proficient full-stack developer. Beyond coding, I'm deeply intrigued by data analytics and machine learning. Currently, I'm applying my skills as a software developer intern at Geotab Inc., bringing my self-taught expertise into a professional environment.
